short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mute and unmute all your Discord servers with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discord Quiet is designed to enhance your Discord experience by providing a simple yet powerful tool to manage server notifications. With this extension, you can:

- Mute all your Discord servers with a single click, reducing distractions.
- Unmute all servers just as easily, ensuring you never miss important updates.
- Enjoy a user-friendly interface that integrates directly into Discord.
- Perfect for students, professionals, and gamers who need to manage their server notifications effectively.

This extension is coded by A.I. ðŸ˜‰. It's 100% free without any paywall and it's:
- Easy to install and set up.
- Lightweight and efficient, ensuring minimal impact on your browser's performance.
- Compatible with the latest versions of Chromium-based browsers.
